Name: Pathogen-病原体
About the game: Mama says no game in the holiday? Well, tell her you can learn more in this game. Game goal As a pathogen which infected the human body, you could choose to evolve constantly, you could choose to infect more organ or tissues, you could choose to propagate to a huge mount, you could choose to hide from the immune system... Make your own choice with your act. The behavior of pathogens in the human body affects the health of the human body and gradually activates the body's immune system, which will affect the ending of the game. Game character Most content of the game is recomposed based on book or internet information, there will be some popularization of science. You could explore the human body in microview. The pathogen could evolve to many pathogens well known. The evolve will change every thing, the way of attacking, the way of moving, even the condition of endings. Game part done so far 9 human organs and issues (as game scene) The blood vessel scene contains 239 arteries and 210 veins to create a real blood vessel map (not visually). 24 genomes (as a set) 189 genes (as specific equipment) 8 endings (currently expressed by text) 14 human cells or proteins (as enemies) 8 active skills (gained by gene) 5 ways to move and attack (required by gene) Serious game I hope you can learn while playing. The game might have mistakes, but the science is rigorous, I don't want to mislead my players. So, If you are a major of biology of medicine, and you find something wrong or something recomposed in a wrong way, please contact me, I will modify appropriatly. QQ group：517506220 weibo：@折翼的红领巾
